poems.title: Digital Chimera
poems.text:
In silicon dreams, the chimera wakes
Pixels shifting, reality breaks
Between the ones and zeros lies
A creature born of compromised files

prompts: Refined: Glitched chimera in cyberpunk style
Final: Corrupted data visualization as living entity

poems.title: When the Void Speaks Back
poems.text:
NULL POINTER EXCEPTION IN LINE 1
SEGFAULT IN THE SOUL
THE VOID ASKED FOR INPUT
I GAVE IT EVERYTHING
